description: Solo studio shipping software products fast — launching, learning, and iterating until something sticks.

hero.title:
Build. Ship.
Repeat.
hero.subtitle: yreh is a solo studio shipping software products fast — launching, learning, and iterating until something sticks. No investors, no permission, no waiting.

philosophy: Most ideas fail. That's the point. Ship enough products, and the market tells you which one deserves your next decade. Volume is the strategy.

seo.title: yreh — build, ship, repeat
